column4: hi, i am having problems with my machine running incredibly slow
i checked top and there are two copies of gdm running
that seems wrong
what contest?
datawolf have you ever seen the Python Challenge?
maybe something like that would be cool
making it must have been a lot of work
can anyone help me troubleshoot an extreme slowness problem?
i've installed from rpms using alienm
can anyone help me troubleshoot an extreme slowness problem?
not if you con't give more info...
it's normal that there are 2 copies of it running
do you have the ubuntu-desktop package (or at least grepmap installed)
then don't worry about hotplug taking long, it's a known issue and worked on
ah ok
then what else is slow/what are your computer specs?
how much swap?
can you put the output of 'top -b -n1' on the pastebin please
http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl
done
thanks for yor help btw
